    • Uses of RuleGrounding in opendial.domains.rules

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RuleGrounding.Failed
      Special type of rule grounding when the grounding has "failed", i.e.
      Methods in opendial.domains.rules that return RuleGrounding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RuleGrounding RuleGrounding.copy()
      Copies the groundings
      RuleGrounding Rule.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the set of groundings that can be derived from the rule and the specific input assignment.
      RuleGrounding RuleCase.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the possible groundings for the case, based on the provided input assignment.
      Methods in opendial.domains.rules with parameters of type RuleGrounding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RuleGrounding.add(RuleGrounding other)
      Adds a list of alternative groundings to the existing set
      void RuleGrounding.extend(RuleGrounding other)
      Extends the existing groundings with the alternative groundings
      Method parameters in opendial.domains.rules with type arguments of type RuleGrounding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RuleGrounding.add(java.util.Collection<RuleGrounding> alternatives)
      Adds a collection of alternative groundings.

    • Uses of RuleGrounding in opendial.domains.rules.conditions

      Methods in opendial.domains.rules.conditions that return RuleGrounding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RuleGrounding BasicCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the set of possible groundings for the given input assignment
      RuleGrounding ComplexCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the groundings for the complex condition (which is the union of the groundings for all basic conditions).
      RuleGrounding Condition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the set of possible groundings derived from the condition, based on the given assignment.
      RuleGrounding NegatedCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input) 
      RuleGrounding TemplateCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns the set of possible groundings for the given input assignment
      RuleGrounding VoidCondition.getGroundings(Assignment input)
      Returns an empty set of groundings
